title: Reformation’s Winter Sale Is Back — And Up To 50%

If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. What better way to celebrate the chilly season than with the beloved winter Reformation sale? The reader-favorite dress destination’s biggest markdown event has arrived with a bang: For a limited time, score up to 50% off select styles, from luxe holiday dresses and skirts to polished pants and cozy cardigans (both of which are s’cute for the office or a dinner date). These discounts demand the online equivalent of an awkward, arms-flailing speed walk — scrolling with purpose and maybe a little panic. So, get moving and scoop up favorites fast. The cutest ‘fits won’t wait, and neither should you. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 50% Off Reformation Sweaters From oversized cashmere polos to a scarf-adorned crewneck, Reformation’s knits deliver in quality and trend appeal. Secure your cozy winter favorites before they’re gone for good. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 50% Off Reformation Dresses It wouldn’t be a Reformation sale without marked-down dresses. Think of it as a treasure trove of minis, midis, and maxis, from shimmering, party-ready gowns to fitted sweater styles perfect for casual plans. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 40% Off Reformation Coats & Jackets Timeless wool coats, ladylike jackets, quiet luxury toppers: Reformation’s on-sale outerwear selection is filled with modern classics. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 50% Off Reformation Tops & Tees Reformation does silky boho blouses and second-skin tops with asymmetrical details like no other. Its on-sale edit is all about transitional statement pieces — great to layer under a jacket by day and wear solo with sculptural earrings for date night. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 50% Off Reformation Pants & Skirts Bold red silk pants are a seasonal “It” item, but you can also find slouchy tailored trousers, bubble skirts, and a fringe-sequin mini (screaming New Year’s Eve) at the Reformation sale. Dial them up for a party or temper with a chunky knit and flats for the office. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 40% Off Reformation Denim There’s no such thing as too much denim — especially from Reformation. The sale is stacked with fresh takes on the classics, from black and dark indigo washes to bomber-style jackets and the sleekest mini dress for a prim edge. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 40% Off Reformation Shoes Take your pick from Reformation’s on-sale shoe lineup, where trends and timelessness meet. Ballet flats, slingbacks, kitten heels, and knee-high boots (in a delectable espresso brown) are all here — the finishing touch for any winter look. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 50% Off Reformation Bags Reformation’s on-sale bags are seriously good. You have supple leather buckets with the perfect slouch, the cutest suede satchel in trending grey, a rhinestone-adorned mesh mini made for party nights, and a ‘90s-inspired snake-print shoulder bag that goes with everything.  DashDividers_1_500x100 For more can’t-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter. All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

Photo: Courtesy Of Reformation.

What better way to celebrate the chilly season than with the beloved winter Reformation sale? The reader-favorite dress destination's biggest markdown event has arrived with a bang: For a limited time, score up to 50% off select styles, from luxe holiday dresses and skirts to polished pants and cozy cardigans (both of which are s’cute for the office or a dinner date). These discounts demand the online equivalent of an awkward, arms-flailing speed walk — scrolling with purpose and maybe a little panic. So, get moving and scoop up favorites fast. The cutest ‘fits won’t wait, and neither should you.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

From oversized cashmere polos to a scarf-adorned crewneck, Reformation's knits deliver in quality and trend appeal. Secure your cozy winter favorites before they’re gone for good.

It wouldn’t be a Reformation sale without marked-down dresses. Think of it as a treasure trove of minis, midis, and maxis, from shimmering, party-ready gowns to fitted sweater styles perfect for casual plans.

Timeless wool coats, ladylike jackets, quiet luxury toppers: Reformation’s on-sale outerwear selection is filled with modern classics.

Reformation does silky boho blouses and second-skin tops with asymmetrical details like no other. Its on-sale edit is all about transitional statement pieces — great to layer under a jacket by day and wear solo with sculptural earrings for date night.

Bold red silk pants are a seasonal "It" item, but you can also find slouchy tailored trousers, bubble skirts, and a fringe-sequin mini (screaming New Year’s Eve) at the Reformation sale. Dial them up for a party or temper with a chunky knit and flats for the office.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

There’s no such thing as too much denim — especially from Reformation. The sale is stacked with fresh takes on the classics, from black and dark indigo washes to bomber-style jackets and the sleekest mini dress for a prim edge.

Take your pick from Reformation’s on-sale shoe lineup, where trends and timelessness meet. Ballet flats, slingbacks, kitten heels, and knee-high boots (in a delectable espresso brown) are all here — the finishing touch for any winter look.

Reformation’s on-sale bags are seriously good. You have supple leather buckets with the perfect slouch, the cutest suede satchel in trending grey, a rhinestone-adorned mesh mini made for party nights, and a ‘90s-inspired snake-print shoulder bag that goes with everything.
